articles.description: Alisson is described as "the best goalkeeper in the world" after his heroics help Liverpool produce a smash-and-grab performance to beat Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Alisson: Liverpool goalkeeper hailed as 'best in world' after PSG heroics

articles.description: Bayern Munich have one foot in the quarter-finals of the Champions League after a comfortable win against 10-man Bayer Leverkusen in the first leg of their last-16 clash.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 3-0 Bayer Leverkusen: Harry Kane double bolster hosts' quarter-final hopes

articles.description: Paris St-Germain boss Luis Enrique ends his post-match interview after their remarkable defeat by Liverpool with a bit of positivity.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain 0-1 Liverpool: PSG boss Luis Enrique says football is 'unfair'

articles.description: Liverpool complete one of the biggest smash and grabs in Champions League history to come away from their last-16 first leg against Paris St-Germain with a win.
articles.title: PSG 0-1 Liverpool: Harvey Elliott scores winner in  smash and grab

articles.description: The Football Associations of England, Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales express their intention to submit a joint bid to host the 2035 Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Home Nations intent on joint bid to host 2035 Women's World Cup

articles.description: Raphinha scores as Barcelona secure a narrow win over Benfica in the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie, despite going down to 10 men.
articles.title: Benfica 0-1 Barcelona: Ten-man Barcelona secure narrow win over Benfica

articles.description: Lyon manager Paulo Fonseca is suspended from conducting his matchday duties for almost nine months after angrily confronting a referee.
articles.title: Paulo Fonseca: Lyon boss handed nine-month ban for confronting referee

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Feyenoord vs Inter Milan in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Feyenoord vs Inter Milan: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Emma Raducanu will begin a trial period with Slovakian coach Vladimir Platenik when she plays her first-round match at Indian Wells on Thursday.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu to start trial with coach Vladimir Platenik at Indian Wells

articles.description: Fifa is set to give more than $1bn in prize money to clubs, which is believed to be a record sum, for its summer Club World Cup.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Fifa give to $1bn prize money as Europe nears deal
